Name: Deducto
About the game: Play with 6-10 players online as you either try murdering everyone or finding the murderers and vote them out! Deduction follows the formula set by other hidden role games but has its own twists. With inspiration from Among Us and Trouble in Terrorist Town, Deduction features cams, vents, and more. Features: Proximity voice chat Unique tasks Multiple weapons Multiple roles Have fun harassing your friends around the office!
